entry.title: Plotting molecular electrostatic potential surfaces (MEPS) with ORCA

link.title: Plotting molecular electrostatic potential surfaces (MEPS) with ORCA

entry.summary: It was pissing me off how hard it is to plot decent Molecular Electrostatic Potentials using ORCA and that’s why I’m posting this (so you too don’t have to be pissed off). First of all, ORCA does have a utility to plot MEPS for you, it is called orca_vpot. It is nicely described on chapter 9.46.10 of the ORCA 5.0.3 manual and in the ORCA Input Library.
